Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 63rd/Harper
ShortDescription: Eastbound 63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Dorchester, 64th, Blackstone and 63rd: due to, street blockage near 63rd/Harper.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Dorchester, 64th, Blackstone and 63rd: due to, street blockage near 63rd/Harper.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #52 Kedzie and 52A South Kedzie Temporary Southbound Reroute near Kedzie/63rd Street
ShortDescription: Southbound 52 Kedzie & 52A South Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, 63rd, California, Marquette and Kedzie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #52 Kedzie & #52A South Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, 63rd, California, Marquette and Kedzie: due to, street blockage near Kedzie/63rd Street.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #95 95th Temporary Westbound Reroute near 95th/Eggleston
ShortDescription: Westbound 95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 95th, State, 87th, Halsted and 95th, due to street blockage near 95th/Eggleston.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 95th, State, 87th, Halsted and 95th, due to street blockage near 95th/Eggleston.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: CTA Train Tracker May Be Temporarily Unavailable
ShortDescription: Info in CTA Train Tracker may be temporarily unavailable due to a technical problem. Engineers working to correct.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Information in CTA Train Tracker SM may be temporarily unavailable due to a technical problem.

Engineers are working to correct the problem and we appreciate your patience.

Service is unaffected.
